external_references.description: Tomcik, R. et al. (2022, February 24). Left On Read: Telegram Malware Spotted in Latest Iranian Cyber Espionage Activity. Retrieved August 18, 2022.

objects.description: [STARWHALE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1037) has the ability to create the following Windows service to establish persistence on an infected host: `sc create Windowscarpstss binpath= "cmd.exe /c cscript.exe c:\\windows\\system32\\w7_1.wsf humpback_whale" start= "auto" obj= "LocalSystem"`.(Citation: Mandiant UNC3313 Feb 2022)
